caption.p: ZIKV-IG treatment improves survival of ZIKV-infected mice. Groups of Ifnar1 −/− mice (n = 8) were infected with 1.0 × 10 3 FFU of ZIKV strain FSS13025 via a retro-orbital (r.o.) route. At 24 hrs p.i., mice were treated (via r.o. route) with vehicle, 50, 10, 2, 0.5 or 0.1 mg/kg ZIKV-IG. ( A) Kaplan–Meier survival curves. ( B) Mean percent weights, which are plotted for each group relative to the percent weight on day 0 (baseline). ( C) Clinical scores. Error bars represent standard error of the mean.
